byte_sequences.rule: reject http any any -> any any (msg:"COPILOT - HTTP Packet Detected"; app-layer-protocol:http; sid:2127109; rev:1;)
reject tcp any any -> any 443 (msg:"COPILOT - HTTPS Packet Detected"; flow:established; app-layer-protocol:tls; sid:2271019; rev:1;)
reject tcp any any -> any any (msg:"COPILOT - TLS Packet Detected"; flow:established; app-layer-protocol:tls; sid:2271019; rev:1;)
reject http any any -> any any (msg:"FILEEXT JPG file claimed"; fileext:"jpg"; sid:1; rev:1;)
reject http any any -> any any (msg:"FILEEXT BMP file claimed"; fileext:"bmp"; sid:3; rev:1;)

reject tcp $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET $HTTP_PORTS (msg:"ET CHAT Facebook Chat (send message)"; flow:established,to_server; content:"POST"; http_method; content:"facebook.com"; http_uri; content:"/ajax/chat/send.php"; http_uri; distance:0; reference:url,doc.emergingthreats.net/2010784; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2010784; rev:4;)

reject tcp $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET $HTTP_PORTS (msg:"ET CHAT Facebook Chat (send message)"; flow:established,to_server; content:"POST"; http_method; content:"/ajax/chat/send.php"; http_uri; content:"facebook.com"; http_header; reference:url,doc.emergingthreats.net/2010784; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2010784; rev:3;)
